Original: 小小純Piano酒吧，小酌又可琴師伴唱
EN: Xiaoxiao Chun Piano Bar, you can sing with the pianist

Original: 氣氛高雅卻不失奢華，舒適的座椅，讓人呆再久也不累，老師現場彈奏鋼琴，也會穿插吉他等其他樂器，真的是朋友唱歌小酌一杯的最佳去處。
EN: The atmosphere is elegant but luxurious, comfortable seats, which makes people not tired for a long time. The teacher plays the piano on the spot, and will also intersperse other instruments such as guitar. It is really the best place for friends to sing a drink.

Original: 很單純溫馨的好地方，喝小酒，唱歌，交朋友皆宜。我至少來過五十次啦，還要再來。
EN: Very simple and warm place, drink small wine, sing, and make friends.I have been here at least 50 times, and I have to come again.

Original:
燈光美氣氛佳～
老師也很厲害～
EN:
The lights of the lights are good ~
The teacher is also very powerful ~

Original: 我喜歡 Swing，不錯的鋼琴酒吧🍷 …
EN: I like swing, nice piano bar 🍷 ...

Original: 好地方，服務周到，價格合理！
EN: Good place, thoughtful service, reasonable price!
